DOC.brief_title: Laser Cataract Surgery With Femtosecond Laser Technology
DOC.criteria: Study participant must cataract phacoemulsification extraction posterior IOL implantation plan least one eye . Study participant capable achieve good 20/30 Snellen best correct distance vision cataract extraction IOL implantation . The surgeon may use Mento Potential Acuity Meter ( PAM ) laser interferometer , McIntyre Pinhole , his/her judgement estimate patient 's potential acuity . Concurrent participation participation last 30 day clinical trial . Known steroid IOP responder . Taking medication may affect vision , IOP , ease cataract surgery ( e.g . Flomax , Glaucoma medication , etc. ) . Acute chronic disease illness would increase risk confound study result ( e.g . uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , immunocompromised , etc. ) . Uncontrolled systemic ocular disease . Corneal abnormality ( e.g . stromal , epithelial , endothelial dystrophy ) Pseudoexfoliation . Ocular hypertension ( > =20hg ) glaucomatous change optic nerve .
